name: Academic Paper Submission Workflow
description: Complete workflow for academic paper submission with fraud detection and blockchain attestation

nodes.name: HTTP Trigger
nodes.description: Receives paper submission from NocoDB interface

nodes.name: Validate Submission
nodes.description: Validates required fields and ENS identity

nodes.name: Upload to IPFS
nodes.description: Uploads paper to IPFS via Pinata API

nodes.name: Fraud Detection Analysis
nodes.description: Runs cross-modal fraud detection on paper content

nodes.name: Create EAS Attestation
nodes.description: Creates blockchain attestation via EAS API

nodes.name: Assign Reviewers
nodes.description: Automatically assigns peer reviewers based on expertise

nodes.name: Send Notifications
nodes.description: Notifies authors and reviewers of submission status
